ygData.subject: Re: Re: Grrrrrrrr!
ygData.msgSnippet: Uldar, you are TOO funny!! I ve felt this way for about half the posts on here. No one talks common anymore; (for all you STRICT rp ers out there, that s
ygData.messageBody:
Uldar, you are TOO funny!! I've felt this way for about half the posts on
here. No one talks common anymore; (for all you STRICT rp'ers out there,
that's English is.)

Everyone, please make an attempt to make things simple for people like Uldar
and myself who don't go on suicide missions in SolB at level 20 or 35,
therefore having no idea what RL (real life) basis you're using.

On the behalf of the lower and clueless out there, we thank you! =) Maybe
now we'll understand more of what is being said, get more out of the posts,
and avoid deleting all posts from certain senders who elminate some of
his/her audience by the language, jargon, and/or text they use. Thank you
all!

Pava Rahti, 20th Bard
<Silent Dragons>
Cazic Thule


Hey Hamonic, I would like to say "Oh! yeah, all the way to Djarn huh?
and from the bat cave too? wow." But I have no Idea what you are talking
about, and If I don't then I'm sure a lot of others don't too. Do you mean a
LOOONG way or just a little way? Can they track Bandl McMarrin from
Permafrost, or maybe just Captain silverwind from the bank in Kelethin? Give
us a scale to measure that you don't have to be 40th to go by :)

Uldar Ulfangson
35th Bard, Rodcet Nife
